name: isoelectronic
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having the same number or structure of electrons (= extremely small pieces of matter with a negative electrical charge): Isoelectronic ions are different elements that have identical electronic configurations. The molecules N2O and CO2 are isoelectronic, with 22 electrons.
More examplesFewer examplesThe quality of the parametric fit is illustrated for the sodium isoelectronic sequence shown in figure 1. Screening parameters are obtained for varying nuclear charges in each isoelectronic groundstate configuration.
